investigatorQuestion.text: The victim's phone records show multiple calls from your number that night. Why were you calling them?

maskAnswers.playerLine: We were coordinating on a time-sensitive project. I can show you the emails that prompted those calls.

lowTension.text: Finally, the statue speaks. But I’m going to need a lot more.
That actually aligns. I didn't think you had it in you.

highTension.text: There it is! Strangle hard enough, something real pops out.
Finally! It’s coming out now, piece by piece.

maskAnswers.playerLine: I was worried about them! They'd been acting strange lately. I just wanted to check in...

lowTension.text: The tears don't change the facts.
No more crying. No more hiding. No more light.
Innocence is a fragile thing. Once it’s broken, no amount of weeping can mend it.

highTension.text: Stop the sniveling! It won't save you now!
Your tears are useless here. They won’t wash away what’s on your hands.
I don't care if you're scared. I care about the truth!

maskAnswers.playerLine: So what? I call people! It's not a crime to use a phone!

lowTension.text: All that noise won’t change anything. You’re just wasting oxygen that you’re going to need later.
A loud mouth. A closed mind. A locked cell.
Anger is just a mask for fear. I'm looking forward to seeing what's hiding underneath.

highTension.text: Keep screaming and I’ll make sure only four walls and a steel door will hear you from now on!
Finally, real passion. Everything comes out when people lose control.
You were so focused on yelling you forgot to keep the pieces together.

maskAnswers.playerLine: We talked all the time, Detective. Best friends do that. I'm sure your records show plenty of friendly chats.

lowTension.text: That’s an intricate story, but even the tightest knots eventually unravel!
You weave beautiful webs. But even the spider eventually gets tangled.
You weave. You spin. You choke.

highTension.text: Stop spinning webs! The truth is staring at you and you’re still trying to paint over it!
Every word is rot. Every breath is poison. Every second is a lie.
You think you're smart? You're in that chair for a reason, and it’s not because you’re a genius.
